A call to sinners such as are under sentence of death and such as are under any prospect of it from the long-suffering and gracious, but most righteous God / by His servant, Daniel Burgess. Burgess, Daniel, 1645-1713.
[3], 30 p.
Printed for Tho. Parkhurst, and Robert Gibbs, London : 1689.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
